I hear nothing in the 2nd file, but i raised the volume of the first file  
and it sounds like it says "Weirdo" and i reversed that file and now i believe  
it says "Margaret".  I've attached the 2 files i re-worked for you.
 
-Steve H.
 
 
 
 
In a message dated 1/1/2008 5:22:01 P.M. Eastern Standard Time,  
debbie@... writes:

 
 
 
Hi all,

I'm attaching an EVP that I picked up last week. We could  hear it in 
person at the time, and it sounded like "get out." Once I  pulled it 
into Audacity, it sounded completely different. Slowing it down  33% 
makes it sound even more different. Any guesses? I haven't done  
anything to these files other than to slow the second version down a  
bit. Deb T
